Revoltab Ltd.

Revoltab's Smart Home Room Fragrance Solution offers a premium room fragrance capsule system with a smart diffuser, vegan room fragrances, and convenient app or dashboard control. It caters to various settings, including private, hotel, office, retail, and medical spaces, with flexible purchasing and subscription options. The company is actively seeking partnerships and distribution channels, showcasing its innovative solution at CES 2024.
